MemoryInfobox.name: Atoll Order
MemoryInfobox.description: 'The jealous Glaukos|harbormaster had yet another task for Kassandra. He claimed that Diona needed a man to die.'

General_Description: '''Atoll Order''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: [[Glaukos]] requested Kassandra to kill a man whom he claims [[Diona]] wanted dead.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra received her new task from Glaukos and sailed the ''[[Adrestia]]'' south to the [[Chytra Atoll]] to deal with the captain. Near the [[Shipwreck Campsite]], [[Ikaros]] located him.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I see him.''
Kassandra stalked into the camp and killed the captain. However, she took note of his appearance.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''These don't look like [[Cult of Kosmos|Cult]] members. Probably just well-paid [[Mercenary|mercenaries]].''
With the payment set to be delivered to the ship, Kassandra made her way back to Kythera to complete Diona's other tasks.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed the captain that Diona, and by extension Glaukos, wanted dead.
Section_Trivia: *The captain can be knocked out and recruited as a lieutenant abroad the ''Adrestia''.
